nodes.text: Revenge of the Sith: In Their Own Words

"Revenge of the Sith: In Their Own Words" is an article that was published in Star Wars Insider 157. It includes a series of interviews with several members of the cast and crew of Star Wars: Episode III Revenge of the Sith, including Bonnie Maree Piesse, David Acord, Peter Mayhew, Anthony Daniels, Rick McCallum, Jeremy Bulloch, Christian Simpson, Kenny Baker, and Danny Wagner.
